org.activebpel.wsio.invoke
Interface IAeTwoPhaseInvokeHandler

All Superinterfaces:
IAeInvokeHandler
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeProcessInvokeHandler
public interface IAeTwoPhaseInvokeHandler
extends IAeInvokeHandler

Extends the invoke handler such that the invocation process is comprised of two parts - prepare followed by handleInvoke.

The prepare method is first called by the engine, and if this method returns true, then the handleInvoke method is called, aynchronous to the current execution thread.

Method Summary
 boolean prepare(IAeInvoke aInvoke, java.lang.String aQueryData)
           Lets the handler prepare for the invoke.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.activebpel.wsio.invoke.IAeInvokeHandler
handleInvoke
 

Method Detail

prepare

public boolean prepare(IAeInvoke aInvoke,
                       java.lang.String aQueryData)
                throws AeInvokePrepareException

Lets the handler prepare for the invoke. This method is called prior to the handleInvoke method. If this method returns true, then the handleInvoke will be called.

This method is called in the same execution thread as the invoke activity. How ever, the handleInvoke may be called asynchronously.

Parameters:
aInvoke - web service invoke.
Returns:
true if successful.
Throws:
AeInvokePrepareException
